suppressedMessages.message: React Hook useEffect has a missing dependency: 'fetchJobs'. Either include it or remove the dependency array.

suggestions.desc: Update the dependencies array to be: [fetchJobs, isAuthenticated]

messages.message: 'requireAuth' is assigned a value but never used.
Unexpected any. Specify a different type.

suggestions.desc: Use `unknown` instead, this will force you to explicitly, and safely assert the type is correct.
Use `never` instead, this is useful when instantiating generic type parameters that you don't need to know the type of.
